Hero.title: Mobile Frontend Developer
Hero.subtitle: React Native & React.js Expert
Hero.description: Freelance Mobile Frontend Developer with experience in Supabase, Tailwind CSS, and RESTful APIs. Currently pursuing a B.Sc. in Computer Science at University of the People, with hands-on training from Siliconmade Academy. Focused on building user-centered applications with clean code and dynamic UI.

About.title: About Me
About.description: As a technology enthusiast software developer, I focus on producing user experience-oriented and high-performance solutions with modern web technologies.

Skills.title: My Skills
Skills.description: I have comprehensive experience in modern web development technologies. I focus on continuous learning and self-improvement.
Skills.learningDescription: The technology world is changing rapidly and I continue to learn continuously to keep up with this change. I follow new technologies, apply them in my projects and share them with the community.

Projects.title: My Projects
Projects.description: You can examine some of the projects I have developed. Each project has been created using different technologies and approaches.
Projects.seeMoreDescription: You can examine more projects and open source contributions on my GitHub account. You can also follow me to get up-to-date information about new projects.

Experience.title: My Experience
Experience.description: I have gained comprehensive experience by working in different companies and projects throughout my career. I learned new skills in each position and constantly improved myself.
Experience.corporateDescription: Experience working in large teams and managing complex projects
Experience.fastLearningDescription: Ability to quickly learn new technologies and apply them in projects
Experience.teamworkDescription: Experience working in different roles and team leadership

Contact.title: Get In Touch
Contact.description: You can contact me to talk about your projects, collaborate or just say hello. I will get back to you as soon as possible.
Contact.name: Full Name
Contact.subject: Subject
Contact.success: Your message has been sent successfully! I will get back to you as soon as possible.
Contact.error: An error occurred while sending the message. Please try again.

Footer.description: A software developer who develops user experience-oriented, high-performance and scalable applications with modern web technologies.
